articles.description: Experts fear this record breaking price increase may only get worse for multiple reasons, including the political tension between Russia and Ukraine.
articles.content:
SAN DIEGO COUNTY, Calif. San Diego has hit records for the countys highest gas price in history.

articles.author: Nate DiCamillo
articles.title: Used-car prices in the US are dropping again - Quartz
articles.description: The fall in US used-car prices in the first half of February has wiped out January’s surge.
articles.content:
The fall in US used-car prices in the first half of February has wiped out Januarys surge.
